title: Lost Connection after Pixel 2 upgraded to android 10.0
content:
My pixel 2 shows "no service" after going to android 10.0, I also try different SIM card and neither do they work, however the card is fine. Now no phone calls and messages can be sent and received, No internet service. 
I tried many time reset it to factory setting, but it can be android 10 only, and the issue is still there.
I don't know How this can happen form a simple upgrade. Does any one face this?
